Class ArrayCharSource

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.streams.charsource.ArrayCharSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharacterSource
public class ArrayCharSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements CharacterSource

This class implements CharacterSource interface by any character arrays

      public void back() throws ContentException
      Description copied from interface: CharacterSource

      Specified by:

      Throws:
